answerText: cyclohexane [10] Most industrial cyclohexane is used in the production of intermediates of the 6-form of this polymer, which is made by polymerizing caprolactam obtained from the nitration of cyclohexane.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Pittsburgh A and Walter Johnson High School | 12 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This molecule, which is useful as solvent, comes in chair, boat, and twist conformations.  [10] Names this molecule with chemical formula C6H12.
